title: How to Preserve Air Jordan Sneakers

steps.title: Put them in zip locks with few packs of silica.
steps.content: Put them in zip locks with few packs of silica. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Buy Force guards.
steps.content: Buy Force guards. If you have a ton of shoes but preserving them is worth it as it makes creasing nearly impossible. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Try not to wear them in bad weather.
steps.content: Try not to wear them in bad weather. Even the lightest rain can damage your shoes and cut off a year in its life.

steps.title: Try not to wear the same shoe more than twice a week at max!
steps.content: Try not to wear the same shoe more than twice a week at max! [3] X Research source If you have a lot of shoes, then schedule when you'll wear them. It sounds like high maintenance but you'll be glad you did it!

steps.title: Use light cleaning agents.
steps.content: Use light cleaning agents. Try Mr. Clean 's Magic Eraser.

steps.title: When you get home, don't just leave your shoes by the door to collect dust.
steps.content: When you get home, don't just leave your shoes by the door to collect dust. Just put them back in the box. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Keep them in dark areas like your closet.
steps.content: Keep them in dark areas like your closet. Light ages a shoe and the material. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Stay away from clubs and dances.
steps.content: Stay away from clubs and dances.

steps.title: Don't drive with nice shoes.
steps.content: Don't drive with nice shoes. You only use the front of your foot to hit the pedals and that creates a 45 degree crease angle and your shoe will crease. Try bringing an extra pair of old shoes!

steps.title: Don't continuously clean your shoe after each time you wear them!
steps.content: Don't continuously clean your shoe after each time you wear them! Continuous cleaning from water creates oxidation in the air and that very air you breathe creates a chemical compound that creates the infamous yellowing found on famous Jordans like the 5's,6's,11's,and 16's. The less water, the better and the less cleaning, the better.
